hero.title: Open-source
hero.subtitle: We develop open-source solutions to improve education. We help businesses, schools, universities and content creators to offer the best possible learning experience.

metadata.title: Zoonk: Open-source solutions for education
metadata.description: Zoonk provides open-source learning tools for businesses, schools, universities and content creators.

twitter.title: Zoonk
twitter.description: We provide open-source learning tools for businesses, schools, universities and content creators.

questions.title: Support
questions.description: You can ask general questions about our products on our community forum.

sales.title: Sales or partnerships
sales.description: If you want to talk about sales or partnerships, please send an email to hello@zoonk.org.

metadata.title: Contact us - Zoonk
metadata.description: Reach out to the Zoonk team.

metadata.title: Zoonk: Open-source alternative to Duolingo.
metadata.description: Zoonk is an open-source platform for creating interactive courses like Duolingo. You can create a white-label Duolingo for your school, university or business.

zoonk.name: Zoonk
zoonk.title: Interactive courses for your business or school
zoonk.subtitle: Make business training and school lessons engaging and practical. From onboarding and homework to product tutorials and beyond, Zoonk makes learning much more fun.
zoonk.short_description: Create interactive courses for your school or business.

metadata.title: Zoonk Learn: Learn new skills using AI
metadata.description: Zoonk Learn allows you to learn any subject or skill using AI. Use AI to increase your income.

learn.name: Learn
learn.title: Learn anything you want
learn.subtitle: Use AI to learn a new subject or develop your skills. Learn anything faster than ever - and have fun while doing it.
learn.short_description: Use AI to learn a new subject or develop your skills.

metadata.title: Zoonk School: Interactive SAT-prep courses
metadata.description: Get a high score on the SAT with Zoonk School. Our interactive courses are designed to help you prepare for the SAT exam.

school.name: School
school.title: Get ready for the SAT
school.subtitle: Interactive courses to help you prepare for the SAT exam. Get a high score and get into the college of your dreams.
school.short_description: Interactive courses to help you prepare for the SAT exam.

metadata.title: Zoonk Devs: API for online schools
metadata.description: API and frontend elements for building online schools. Easily create and customize your online school.

devs.name: Devs
devs.title: APIs for online schools
devs.subtitle: API and frontend elements for building online schools. Easily create and customize your own school.
devs.short_description: API and frontend elements for building online schools.

metadata.title: Zoonk Games: Immersive learning
metadata.description: Learn new skills with practical missions in an immersive game where you need to solve real-world problems.

games.name: Games
games.title: Immersive learning
games.subtitle: Learn new skills with practical missions in an immersive game where you need to solve real-world problems.
games.short_description: Learn new skills solving real-world problems.
